comment: Such a great organic professor and VERY helpful! Highly recommend his class

Would recommend. This man is a genius and extremely helpful. Take advantage of his office hours and you will see a huge improvement in your grade. O chem is not easy but Dr. G explains it clearly with tips. Great grading system. Would take O chem again if it were with him.
Dr. G is the nicest professor I've ever had and he is ALWAYS approachable and willing to explain things.  I wish he taught all chem classes!
Dr.G is an awesome professor! He is very clear with his expectations. It is not that he is hard. The class is hard. He is great! If you can get his class TAKE IT!
Dr.G is the best. Nicest guy and will really make sure you understand. Very approachable.Take him he is great.

Dr. G is one of the best professors I've ever had the pleasure of taking. He uses little devices and schemes to help you learn. If there's something you don't understand he will gladly explain it again. Very approachable outside of class and will do anything to make sure you learn and understand the material. All around fantastic professor.TAKE HIM

Great teacher. He is very enthusiastic. Attendance is not mandatory, but going to class is very helpful. He is also very thoughtful, I missed class twice in a row because I was sick and he emailed me to check on me.

Dr. Gwaltney is one of the best professors I have ever encountered! If you have the opportunity to take his class... You should!! He is very helpful and he teaches in a way that everyone should be able to understand. Even if you hate organic, you probably will leave his class with a new love for it! His tests are very straightfoward if you practice

Very helpful processor who explains the material well. Prepare for quizzes because they are easy to fail if you don't. Go to class and do the practice sheets as this makes studying easier. Reaction Notebook is helpful in learning the material although the amount of problems required is ridiculous in comparison to the amount of points.

BEST OCHEM PROFESSOR! Make sure you keep up with your reaction notebook cos it'll help you a lot during exam time. His exams are mainly reactions and maybe 1 or 2 namings. Keep up with the notebook and practice worksheets and you'll do fine. Go to him for help if you're stuck..he helps you out a lot. Take him for Ochem 1 and 2. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Great professor! He really makes the subject easy to learn.  He also gives a lot of partial credit.  I got an A in the class without too much effort.

Absolutely amazing. Is always there to help if you go to his office, and emails back immediately. He makes the class more relatable and gives so much extra practice problems. 3 tests and a final that he makes up. A few quizzes but he lets you know in advance. Keep up with the reaction notebook it helps!

Extremely helpful! Does a lot of practice in class so it really helps you learn the material. Provides a lot of practice to do outside of class. He seems like he really cares about each student's success and love of Organic Chemistry. Gives a 10 minute break in class after doing a lot of new material. AWESOME TEACHER.

Had him for Org 1&2. Best orgo professor at KSU. Don't wait the last minute to study reactions!His quizzes and exams are mainly reactions, no MC. Do the practice problems he provides on Vista.If you can do those, you'll be fine.GO TO HIM if you're lost. He'll teach you til you understand it. Very approachable, highly recommend him :)

His class requires a lot of study time (it's organic chemistry). If you need help dont be afraid to ask him!!! He's very helpful. Do the practice sheets on time and ask for help if you feel like you need it. SHOW UP TO CLASS!!! And Practice, practice, practice the problems. The book was useless to me.

Excellent Teacher! Organic Chemistry is a very difficult subject, but Dr. G works hard at helping his students understand it. If you study, attend all lectures, work on practice problems, and ask him questions, then you will easily get an A just like I did. This class is definitely not for last minute crammer's and people who don't work hard...

He's very clear with the material, gives a lot of examples to have a better understanding of the material. He suggests to read the material before going to class and provides practices that will help you throughout the semester. He's very organized with the lecture and concise and comprehensive

Great professor. Don't miss class!! - his lectures are exactly what will be on quizes/exams and he prepares you very well. He posts ppts but they are useless if you don't have class notes to go along with them. Didn't read the book at all, he posts LOTS of practice sheets -- USE THEM TO STUDY! I would definitely take him again

He's absolutely AMAZING! He made me fall in love with Organic Chemistry. It's a tough course, but you're in college and if you work hard and study you'll make an A. Highly recommend taking him! He also has an awesome personality and always willing to help.

I?m in agreement with some of the other commentary regarding Dr Gwaltney. I also thought he was going to be awesome, but I don't think he did an adequate job explaining the course material, and occasionally showed a lack of patience answering questions. Most of the time, I taught myself using the textbook.

From all of the reviews on here, I thought he was going to be AMAZING, but he really wasn't. He's obviously super smart and knows his stuff, but I didn't think he did very well explaining it to the class. He was nice, and funny sometimes, but I WILL NOT take him again. I'm a straight-A student and failed all quizzes and tests, so I dropped.

He's FANTASTIC! great professor, really makes Organic chemistry fun and knows his stuff. Its a difficult class, but if you're serious about it you can get an A. Always makes time for his students and is very kind in helping. Take him! :)

Loved this class!! Dr. Gwaltney is by far the most helpful professor I have ever had. His office is always open, and he has no problem with students stopping by to ask questions (even if you didn't make an appointment). If you go to class and do the work, you'll make an A.

Had him for lab -awesome teacher. Very helpful with lab reports; he'll look over it ahead of time & return it with suggestions. Also very helpful during lab. And he's funny and easy to talk to. Definitely recommended!
The guy knows what he's talking about. Try not to miss class, study reaction notebook & practice. Take him if you can.

Knows he s material very helpful but have to attend the class to know what he's talkin about. Study the reactions thts wht his tests are all about u have know the reactions like back of ur hand no multiple choice tests quizzes are all about reactions drops 1 test out 3 and drops two lowest quiz grades
Attending his lectures are mandatory! He gives out quizzes and has his own worksheet that you helps you understand the material. Great teacher
Dr. Gwaltney is a wonderful professor. He is always willing to help students with anything. The key to his class is staying ahead and doing his practice sheets.

Dr. Gwaltney is probably the best professor I have had at KSU. He explains the material very well. Organic Chemistry is a hard but Dr. Gwaltney's office is always opened. His practice sheets prepare for the the quizzes in return the quizzes prepare you for the exams!! A great professor and the only professor to take Organic Chemistry with!!
No Comments

Dr. Gwaltney is probably the best professor I have had at KSU. He explains the material very well. Organic Chemistry is a hard class but if you need help Dr. Gwaltney's office is always opened and he is willing to help you. He gives a lot of practice problems which prepare you not only for the quizzes he gives but for the exams as well.
No Comments
No Comments
He's super awesome and helpful.  Nice prof!
I was so scared to take organic that I put it off for literally years. Now I changed my major to chemistry. He was the reason why. The most helpful teacher I have had in college.
He is a good lecturer and a great professor overall.  His quizzes aren't the easiest in the world, but they prepare you for his tests very well.

He is the best organic teacher at Kennesaw State, his door is always open to anyone and he is never rude and unwilling to help.  I wish I could say that about the other teachers.  Organic is a hard class, but if you do his practice sheets then you will be fine.

DR G's a good guy. He likes to joke around but also knows what he's talking about. Doesn't mind admitting when he's wrong. I'll be taking his courses in my higher level Chem classes if I get the chance
very clear. his office door is always open.  tough coarse.  almost half of the class droped (summer).  i liked him.
